doc.str: Image processing method, image processing program, image processing device, and imaging device

An object of the present invention is to detect motion between plural images with high precision without increasing the number of blocks made by dividing an image. Thus, an image-processing method according to the present invention is characterized by including a searching step (S3) of searching for a local motion vector from each of blocks in the plural images, an electing step (S4) of electing a representative motion vector from the local motion vectors of the respective blocks, and an approximating step (S5) of approximating a motion vector distribution on the images based on the representative motion vector. In addition, when an approximate surface thereof is a plane, the operation amount for approximating the motion vector distribution and the information amount for representing the motion vector distribution can be minimized.
